quote: Besides, Army regulations. A brother never lets a soldier go into battle alone
name: Diggle

quote: Nobody in my life is who I thought they were, except for you
name: Oliver

quote: I wish you would have died on that island.
name: Tommy

quote: I take back every joke I made about you sticking a tracking device in your boot.
name: Diggle

quote: Who the hell is Felicity Smoak?
name: Quentin Lance

quote: The last time the vigilante paid your mom a visit you got shot and I got to play doctor with you. Oh - my brain thinks of the worst way to say things
name: Felicity

quote: You're sniping a sniper, kind of ironic you think?
name: Felicity

quote: This club is important to me, but to you it's just a front. You want me to keep your secret, help you to be this thing you've become, but you refuse to see what I've become. I've got just a bit too much self respect for that. I quit.
name: tommy

quote: Well, if prohibition were still in effect, you might actually have a basis of a criminal complaint.
name: Laurel

quote: My only encounter with drugs was with a pot brownie my freshman year. By mistake! Which could have been fun, except I'm allergic to nuts
name: Felicity

quote: You know, it's pretty exciting that both of you are such bad asses, but do you think we should be making a plan to stop fires and, oh, I don't know, save your dad?
name: Oliver

quote: Well, you'll probably be shocked to hear I didn't go to medical school.
name: Quentin

quote: Bad boys. Hook ya every time
name: Laurel

quote: Joseph, I understand being alone, but it doesn't give you the right to kill him.
name: Oliver

quote: I don't like the idea that somebody dangerous is out there. Somebody else. Because, typically, they don't show my level of restraint
name: Oliver

quote: I was wrong to think that I could have it both ways. To do what I do and have a normal life.
name: Oliver

quote: Me being happy isn't what's important right now
name: Oliver

quote: Then let's talk about Helena. Oliver, if you didn't still have feelings for this girl you would have thought of a different solution than letting her extort you into killing someone.
name: Diggle

quote: I tried to teach you to obtain your objective without killing!
name: Oliver

quote: Yeah, congratulations Ollie. The club doesn't completely suck.
name: Thea

quote: So you really believe this garbage your mother's selling about Sarah being alive on Fantasy Island?
name: Det Lance

quote: I don't know why my dad bought her that canary. The thing chirped day and night; drove us all nuts
name: Laurel

quote: So you're hoping aircraft maintenance is genetic?
name: Slade

quote: The first time anyone's ever been grateful for traffic cameras
name: Felicity

quote: Is this really how you guys figure out how to get your target? Over burgers and shakes?
name: Felicity

quote: Nothing is bred that is weaker than man
name: Oliver

quote: I may be blonde, but I'm not that blonde.
name: Felicity

quote: Oliver. Oh. Wow. Everything about you just became so unbelievably clear.
name: Felicity

quote: Show me a more dangerous rule breaker than The Hood.
name: Tommy

quote: You are so blinded by your hate for him that you don't realize the damage that it's doing in your own life. To your family.
name: Tommy

quote: The experience of helping others it its own reward.
name: Laurel

quote: I've been researching some of those people online and....they're not good people.
name: Oliver

quote: I think this list might have cost Walter his life
name: Felicity

quote: Vertigo is measured in lives. Fifty six people died to perfect this high. Believe me when I say that they did not die for nothing
name: The Count

quote: Apparently he wants to mend some fences, but thanks to him I can't afford a fence, so I can only assume he has some other agenda
name: Tommy

quote: I thought you took that book off your father's dead body. How could he have been so chatty?
name: Diggle

quote: I could be wrong. The list isn't.
name: Oliver

quote: Whoever this guy is, he's got a habit of putting himself between danger and you.
name: Quentin

quote: You'd be surprised the power revenge can give you
name: Oliver

quote: Maybe you should start acting like my mother so I don't have to act like yours.
name: Thea

quote: I'm an all or nothing kind of girl.
name: Laurel

quote: So Laurel's on her own against a murderer who burns people alive?
name: Diggle

quote: They need the man in the hood
name: Diggle

quote: Who are you? Where's my friend Tommy Merlyn? The guy who once rented out a pro football stadium so he could play strip kickball with models.
name: Oliver

quote: Looks like everyone's disappearing.
name: Thea

quote: When I confront somebody on the list I tell them they failed this city, but tonight it's me who failed.
name: Oliver

quote: So is this guy trying to frame you or call you out?
name: Diggle

quote: I think there should be a national holiday for whoever invented French fries. Or at least a statue in their honor
name: Thea

quote: I'm giving up a lot so maybe I thought the universe owed me one.
name: Oliver

quote: Truth be told, billionaire was your least attractive quality.
name: Laurel

quote: You know I think losing my fortune is gonna be easier than losing you so why don't we just stop now.
name: Tommy

quote: You're like a dope fiend who thinks he can deal with his own addiction by making another addict go straight
name: Diggle

quote: I wasn't lying to hurt you, but to keep you safe
name: Moira

quote: She's lost Diggle and whether she knows it or not, I can save her
name: Oliver

quote: I don't kill people unless it's absolutely necessary. It's not my opening move.
name: Oliver

quote: I'm the rich man's Lindsay Lohan
name: Oliver

quote: I just think we need to stop judging him for the Oliver he was and start accepting him for the Oliver he is.
name: Moira

quote: I think it's easy to forget that he lived apart from civilization for five years.
name: Moira

quote: Maybe you should spend a little less time trying to be a hero, you're obviously not very good at it.
name: Thea

quote: Did you know that as a doctor I could diagnose myself as a giant tool?
name: Tommy

quote: For all our sakes, start reading US Weekly.
name: Thea

quote: He's not interested in throwing us a fundraiser. What he wants to have is the first annual attempt to get back into my pants.
name: Laurel

quote: I just got a new sports car, thought we could open her up, get a few speeding tickets
name: Tommy

quote: I don't fight the street crime. That's a symptom of what's wrong with this city, I'm trying to cure the disease.
name: Oliver

quote: It sounds like you have a narrow definition about being a hero
name: Diggle

quote: If any member of my family so much as gets a paper cut, I will burn your entire world to ashes.
name: Moira

quote: I was so focused on what happened to my family that I didn't even stop and wonder what could've happened to you
name: Laurel

quote: Oliver I didn't joining your crusade was every gonna be risk free, I just don't like being played.
name: Diggle

quote: You know us billionaire vigilantes, we do love our toys
name: Oliver

quote: Why should I yell? You're only defending the man that killed your sister.
name: Det Lance

quote: I am having a sizeable get together for tomorrow evening and there is a better than likely chance it spills into the outdoor pool.
name: Oliver

quote: This isn't over. I got the loose end now and no matter what happens I'm going to pull on it until your whole world unravels.
name: Laurel

quote: I got mad relationship skills bro. Let me know if you need any trendy places to propose
name: Thea

quote: I am having a sizeable get together for tomorrow evening and there is a better than likely chance it spills into the outdoor pool.
name: Oliver

quote: This isn't over. I got the loose end now and no matter what happens I'm going to pull on it until your whole world unravels.
name: Laurel

quote: I made peace with your selfishness a long time ago
name: Laurel

quote: I didn't study Shakespeare at any of the four schools that I dropped out of.
name: Oliver

quote: Doesn't you going out and having fun violate some kind of law?
name: Tommy

quote: It's Oliver isn't it? His judgmental hypocrisy is rubbing off on you.
name: Thea

quote: Who stays mad at a castaway?
name: Tommy

quote: He doesn't kill for justice, which makes him as dangerous as anyone on my list.
name: Oliver

quote: Cops brought her home. She and some friends broke into a store, tried on some dresses last night, lit up the breathalyzer like a Christmas tree.
name: Diggle

quote: Our family's wealth had been built on the suffering of others.
name: Oliver

quote: My best friend is getting legally resurrected. I wouldn't miss this for the world.
name: Tommy

quote: Oliver just got back from five years on an uncharted island. Before that he was cheating on me with my sister.
name: Laurel

quote: You know five years ago your irresponsibility was somewhat charming. It is a lot less so now.
name: Moira

quote: Home is a battlefield.
name: Diggle

quote: Before the island I was a jerk, but now I'm just a damaged jerk.
name: Oliver

quote: You know what Oliver? You're wrong that island did change you. At least now you're honest
name: Laurel

quote: She was my sister. I couldn't be angry because she was dead. I couldn't grieve because I was so angry, that's what happens when your sister dies while screwing your boyfriend.
name: Laurel

quote: Everyone is happy you're alive, you wanna see the one person who isn't?
name: Tommy

quote: I want one of those t-shirts that says my friend was a cast away and all I got was this crappy shirt.
name: Tommy

quote: To live I had to make myself more than what I was, to forge myself into a weapon. I am returning not the boy who was shipwrecked, but the man who will bring justice to those who have poisoned my city. My name is Oliver Queen.
name: Oliver

quote: You helped me become a hero, Slade. Thank you
name: Oliver

quote: You can kill me or not. Either way, I win.
name: Slade

quote: The Mirakuru isn't what made me hate you! The end is near, but maybe I'll be merciful enough to let you live and see your city burn!
name: Slade

quote: Gee Sara, you could have called before you invited ... seven assassins into our lair.
name: Felicity

quote: He lacked the conviction, the strength to pull the trigger, but not you Thea. You are truly my daughter and I could not be more proud.
name: Malcolm

quote: I'm just saying, if you guys don't come back alive I'm gonna be really pissed.
name: Felicity

quote: If you're so far gone and so irredeemable, then why would they know you by such a beautiful name?
name: Laurel

quote: Lieutenant, I know he's breaking the law, but what we're up against is not about the law, it's about survival. We've got masks tearin' our city to pieces and we're gonna need a mask to stop them.
name: Lance

quote: I don't need you right now. Everyone else does. So go; go save the city.
name: Laurel

quote: This started with the three of us. It's time we got back to that.
name: Oliver

quote: What's happening is bigger than you and Slade. This city needs the Arrow.
name: Laurel

quote: Slade's whole plan was to take everything from me. He did. He wins. All that's left is for me to die.
name: Oliver

quote: You once told me a copy was a cop was only as good as his gut. Well I'm the daughter of a cop, and I know in my gut, Sebastian is not the man that you think he is.
name: Laurel

quote: I don't even know why I'm crying. I didn't even like Moira. Terrible thing to say about someone after they just died. In my defense, she was not nice. She was diabolical. Not a word you often hear at someone's funeral.
name: Felicity

quote: Thea hates you right now because of the things you've done. Terrible things. So let her see you do something good. As mayor.
name: Oliver

quote: Mom, it doesn't seem fair to me. One mistake and it feels like my entire life is over.
name: Oliver

quote: Five years ago I had the chance to use the cure on Slade. I chose to kill him. Everything that's happening now is my fault.
name: Oliver

quote: It's The Arrow that matters. The man under the hood isn't important. Can you imagine what it's like to be him? What he has to live with day in and day out? What that's gotta be like? Hey? The least I can do is to a little bit of time for him.
name: Lance

quote: No, you know what I am? Is the daughter of two mass murderers. Not one, but two. So let's face it, Ollie. I was never gonna be OK. It's not in my genes.
name: Thea

quote: You're my half brother. You know who else was my half brother? Tommy! Tommy who I tried to kiss. I tried to kill my half brother before my real father killed him! That's how screwed up I am!
name: Thea

quote: It says Thea Queen here. Who's she?
name: Thea

quote: Sometimes it's people closest to us who lie to us best.
name: Laurel

quote: For the record, I hated her before we found out she was a super villain.
name: Felicity

quote: I don't think my eye holes line up properly. Is anyone else having this problem?
name: Felicity

quote: You're special forces, she's an international assassin. You'd think that between the three of us we could have gotten answers out of Slade ourselves instead of turning him into the police. Here's what's really sick, is we didn't even question him because he said it was the right thing to do. Just like he said I had to break up with Thea one week after telling me to leave her alone!
name: Roy

quote: We can't do anything without King Queen's permission.
name: Roy

quote: Your brother has a secret, Thea. Would you like to know what it is?
name: Slade

quote: Well, I told a guy the truth and he got struck by lightening. To be fair, it probably won't happen again. Statistically.
name: Felicity

quote: Why is it so hard for everyone to just tell the truth?
name: Thea

quote: Oliver sure does like to dress up his girls.
name: Huntress

quote: I don't understand! What is so special about me?
name: Laurel

quote: That's why you called me Speedy. I thought you were trying to give me a nickname. For the record, don't call me Speedy.
name: Roy

quote: We've been calling him Deathstroke.
name: Walter

quote: Last night the man who killed my brother showed more character than the woman charged with protecting the world. Good and bad is not so clear to me. One thing I do know for sure, black and white, is that I can't ever lose you again.
name: Diggle

quote: Gimme a break. This ain't no task force. Let's call it like it is. Welcome to the suicide squad.
name: Deadshot

quote: I know exactly how this brotherhood works and right now it works for me.
name: Oliver

quote: You cannot die until you have suffered the same way that I have suffered, until you have known complete despair -- and you will. I promise.
name: Slade

quote: Five years ago I made a promise. Do you remember? Well I'm here to fulfill it. See you around kid.
name: Slade

quote: I believe that when we lose someone we love that we have the obligation to honor it.
name: Slade

quote: You know when we first tried to get off this island it was as strangers; but now it's as brothers.
name: Slade

quote: Because of the life that I lead, I just think it’s better to not be with someone that I could really care about.
name: Oliver

quote: Because I realized that, that I went on that boat with you, too. And I've been slowly drowning for all of these years and after every heartbreak or setback or loss, I sank deeper into the dark water. And so when I saw you, so beautiful and so alive, I realized that I'm not those things. Not anymore. So please, please don't hate me Sara. Please.
name: Laurel

quote: I am the new bartender. I bartended in college and well, it's uh kind of hard to get a job when international assassin is the highlight of your resume.
name: Sara

quote: I've always wanted to say I've taken a bullet for someone and now I can. Yay
name: Felicity

quote: Sara, when you come back from the dead you get a party. It's a Queen family tradition.
name: Sara

quote: What's the matter? They didn't teach you about right crosses in assassin school?
name: Lance

quote: I was with you because I loved you.
name: Sara

quote: You had an affair with Malcolm Merlyn about one year before Thea was born. Merlyn is Thea's father.
name: Felicity

quote: So, the secret society gets a new member.
name: Diggle

quote: Can I make a suggestion? Instead of punishing yourself because you think you destroyed the city, how about you start by saving it?
name: Thea

quote: Charles Manson is relatively well known and I don't believe anyone is going to vote for him.
name: Moira

quote: Uh oh. You got angry face.
name: Felicity

quote: All I'm learning is new ways to get pissed off, and in case you haven't noticed I'm already pretty good at that.
name: Roy

quote: Iron Heights is better at keeping secrets than it is at keeping prisoners.
name: Felicity

quote: Love's the most powerful emotion and that makes it the most dangerous.
name: Sara

quote: Your incompetence has now cost me four lives, Alderman. Fail me again, and yours will be the fifth.
name: Slade

quote: She nearly had me believing that Sebastian was a criminal mastermind and the only reason that I believed her was because it was Laurel. I do have a blind spot where she's concerned. Not anymore.
name: Oliver

quote: That's the thing about the booze and the pills. The same thing that dulls the pain dulls the judgement.
name: Lance

quote: If that mask is supposed to scare me, all that it's doing it confirming what I've already known for a while now. You're one sick son of a bitch Sebastian!
name: Laurel

quote: Now I don't need his help to protect this city. Let's find us a bad guy.
name: Roy

quote: His last name is Blood, that can't be a good sign.
name: Felicity

quote: I think you didn't have a problem with Felicity’s performance until she met Barry Allen.
name: Diggle

quote: Laurel, if there’s something on your mind, give it voice. I don’t bite. I promise.
name: Sebastian

quote: Not to tell you how to do your vigilante-ing but the grease paint thing is a poor identity concealer.
name: Barry

quote: I will arrange for you receive another sample of my blood, and then you can begin to mass produce the serum again.When I ask you not to confront the vigilante, you will listen. Remember, your mask can be worn by another.
name: Slade

quote: I know I called you a murderer, but you are not. You are a hero. You beat the island. You beat my father. So fight, Oliver. Get up and fight back.
name: Tommy

quote: The island didn't make you strong, kid. It revealed you to be weak.
name: Slade

quote: Oliver Queen. He is a billionare by day and saves the city by night.
name: Barry

quote: So find me a mask that conforms perfectly to my face and doesn't affect my ability to aim while I'm on the run.
name: Oliver

quote: Never meet your heroes, right?
name: Felicity

quote: The five years I was away I encountered things that defy explanation.
name: Oliver

quote: Normal for us is a lavish party
name: Thea

quote: Moira, I know I could be disbarred for speaking with you, but this isn't something for lawyers, this is a family matter.
name: Laurel

quote: Mom, secrets are what put you here. Secrets and lies. Now is the time to give the truth its day.
name: Oliver

quote: I made a choice not to put an arrow in this guy, and it was the right choice. There's no more killing.
name: Oliver

quote: What happens in Russia stays in Russia. Even when it makes no sense whatsoever.
name: Felicity

quote: You sent Felicity Smoak to warn me to leave town. You know The Arrow. You're the girl in the mask. You've been kicking the crap out of creeps in The Glades.
name: Lance

quote: Well that's the thing about forgiveness. You can't get it until you ask for it.
name: Oliver

quote: You've gotta be kidding me. My dad went to you? He spent the last six years cursing your name and now you're, what? Gossip buddies?
name: Laurel

quote: You know Oliver, somebody once told me that secrets have weight. The more you keep, the harder it is to keep moving.
name: Diggle

quote: Do you have any happy stories?
name: Felicity

quote: That a guy with a bow and arrow cannot save a guy who's had a building fall on top of him. What's going on with you is not about The Arrow.
name: Lance

quote: You should be happy I haven't avoided attachment to you.
name: Oliver

quote: Thea, I need you to understand what is going on here. Five hundred and three people are dead and there is a measure of guilt that is owed me. I am ready to accept my punishment.
name: Moira

quote: As if porcelain dolls weren't creepy all on their own.
name: Felicity

quote: Oliver, what I would like to know is what you were doing at Laurel's office in the first place. She makes you public enemy number one and you figured this was a good time to chat?
name: Diggle

quote: Healthcare has enough problems without you punks.
name: Diggle

quote: That outfit, with your coloring - isn't that cruel and unusual punishment or something?
name: Thea

quote: What I lack in height I make up for in wicked good hearing.
name: Roy

quote: I'm not coming back to Starling City. I can't. My mission, my father's list - it was a fool's crusade. And I failed. Malcolm Merlyn destroyed The Glades. Tommy died. And The Hood couldn't stop it, so don't ask me to put it on again. Ever.
name: Oliver

quote: I would have emailed, but this isn't exactly an email hot spot.
name: Diggle

quote: God, um, you... You're really sweaty.
name: Felicity
